channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-14047] Cleanup deprecated APIs from Cell class
item.summary: Cleanup deprecated APIs from Cell class

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Put in RB pls.

RB link.
I ran only modified test cases among which two are failing to me locally TestHFileBlock and TestReplicationWithTags looking into them.
I'm waiting for Hadoop QA report to see if any other test cases are failing.

I just logged in to add this Release note. I think we should also mention them to use the CellUtil.cloneXXX() in place of getXXX - for users who need a replacement, right?

For ops like compare the cell fields against some give bytes, it is advisable to use the getXXXArray and getXXXOffset APIs. Ya when those exact bytes are required then clone is the way.. We have to specify it in correct way.. It is ok to add this info also to the release notes.

org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TestFastFail.testFastFail

The above failed test is not related to this patch.
Updated the release note. Pls edit it if something is missing.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue:
The following API from Cell (which were deprecated since past few major versions) are removed now.
getRow
getFamily
getQualifier
getValue
getMvccVersion
The above apis can be replaced with their respective CellUtil#cloneXXX (allocates a copy) or Cell#getXXXArray (essentially just returns a pointer) based on the use case.
